Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOLICE, T1.NRENDOS, T1.NRPARCEL, T1.DACPARC, T1.FONTE, T1.NRTIT, T1.PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, T1.VAL_DESCONTO_IX, T1.OTNPRLIQ, T1.OTNADFRA, T1.OTNCUSTO, T1.OTNIOF, T1.OTNTOTAL, T1.OCORHIST, T1.QTDDOC, T1.SITUACAO, T1.COD_EMPRESA, T1.TIMESTAMP, T1.SIT_COBRANCA FROM seguros.v0parcela T1, SEGUROS.V0ENDOSSO T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T1.NUM_APOLICE = T2.NUM_APOLICE AND T1.NRENDOS = T2.NRENDOS AND T2.TIPO_ENDOSSO = '1' ORDER BY T1.NRENDOS WITH UR END SQL
